"フォードランの角の調達":
"You won't believe this. While I was
preparing the Nordiran meat, I
accidentally threw out the horns. This
might sound strange, but if you grind
their horns into a fine powder, you get
a really potent spice. Anyway, I'm not
going to give up. Forget the Nordiran
horns, get me some Fordoran horns,
CHOP CHOP!
※Cae de Nv.24+ Fordorans."
